The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 January is 2,339,983 (4,157.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 30 December, there were 291,867 new confirmed cases (518.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 December, there were 232,988 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 25% (58,879 extra cases).
